title: No Point in earning Champion Shards
body:
Hey all,

So I got a question/query.

So I levelled from 21 > 22 and received an unlocked chest thing. Inside it contained a Champion + 20 Blue Essence. What I don't get is that to unlock the champion it would cost me 1800 BE.

Why does it cost so much just to unlock the champion shard?

replies.body:
compare the unlock cost to the IP cost and you will know why.

To unlock the shard is usually about 30% cheaper.
